attributes.action: resign for the good of the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown and his administration has broken Labour's manifesto promise for a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty, failed to control our borders, taxed the poorest, plundered our economy and
pension funds, wasted billions of taxpayer's money, yet has put nothing aside for the rough economic times. This man has allowed us to be occupied by terrorists, but
treats honest citizens like criminals.
He is not fit to hold high office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
